title: Conversational Dynamics
alt: "You should make it so people can search for and jump into hundreds of conversations at once if they want." "Ooh, good idea! I imagine only the most well-informed people with the most critical information to share will use that feature."
transcript:
[Cueball is sitting at a computer and pointing at the CRT monitor. White Hat is standing behind him.]
Cueball: Check it out!  My new system allows anyone on Earth to inject themselves into any conversation happening anywhereÂ  at any time.
White Hat: Cool!  I bet this won't lead to any unhealthy dynamics![Caption under the panel:]
The creation of the modern web
